ability.name: Eye of Disaster
ability.text: As long as Absol is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent puts a Basic Pokémon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Vicious Claw
attacks.text: Choose 1 Pokémon from your hand and put it in the Lost Zone. (If you can't put a Pokémon in the Lost Zone, this attack does nothing.)

cards.name: Palkia & Dialga LEGEND
text: Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Palkia & Dialga LEGEND.
When this Pokémon has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Sudden Delete
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it back into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Time Control
attacks.text: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Palkia & Dialga LEGEND. Add the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck to his or her Prize cards.

cards.name: Alph Lithograph
text: LOOK AT ALL OF YOUR FACE DOWN PRIZE CARDS!
